Authors: Bao-Kai Cui, Lin Zhu, Xing Ji
Title:
Morphological characters and phylogenetic analysis reveal a
new species of Phellinus from Vietnam
Abstract:
During investigations on the species diversity of the
Phelinus from China, a new species, Phellinus vietnamensis sp. nov. is
described based on morphological and molecular data. Morphologically, it
is characterized by perennial, resupinate basidiomata, a dimitic hyphal
system, hooked hymenial setae, and colorless, broadly subglobose to
ovoid, thick-walled basidiospores measuring as 5.56 ×4.85.2 μm.
Phylogenetically, the status of Phellinus vietnamensis sp. nov. is
strongly supported based on sequences
